about.title: Hi, I'm Portia
paragraphs:
Piquant is my definition of how I make food. This is bcdhiaoch dio

Piquant is my definition of how I make food dsico jsdoj

Hope to see you enjoying my food soon!

image1.blurb: Plantano Rellano stuffed with avocado cream topped with chipotle adobe mushrooms

image2.blurb: Ackee & Saltfish money bags with house hot sauce

image3.blurb: 48-hour marinated slow cooked pulled jerk chicken served in a steamed coconut bun with Carabbean slaw

image4.blurb: Poached pear steeped in cinnamon, star anise, cardamon infused sorrel, served with Creme Anglaise topped with crished Meringue & Pistachios
